useCase.name: Access POA Request List View
useCase.trigger: Accredited Representative decides to access the POA Request List view

mainSequence.step: Accredited Representative accesses the POA Request List View
Frontend shows a list of VSO POA Requests retrieved from the server
Frontend requests POA Request List data from the Backend
Backend retrieves and returns the POA Request List data from VAGovDB
Backend returns the POA Request List response to the Frontend
Frontend displays the POA Request List to the Accredited Representative
